entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 11:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
